title: Session 11 sprint
description: 4-instance sprint: p&s KB issues — knock out all actionable KB gaps, standards amendments, template fixes, and workflow bugs. Pipeline leak test + beads load test.

title: Update session handoff template storage path (GH #60)
description: Update 06_Projects/Templates/ai/session_handoff_tpl.md: change storage path from plans/handoffs/ to ~/session-handoffs/<project>/, update naming convention to YYYY-MM-DD_<project>_s<N>_handoff.md, add routing rules for cross-project and multi-instance sessions. Version bump. Branch: docs/s11-templates-fixes. Do NOT update INDEX.md — orchestrator handles that.
close_reason: PR #64 created — all three deliverables in single commit

title: Dependency update cadence — STD-005 extension (GH #46)
description: Extend 03_Engineering_Standards/Coding_Standards_and_Conventions.md with dependency update policy: update cadence (security vs feature), lockfile management, Dependabot/Renovate configuration guidance, version pinning strategy, breaking change handling. Version bump STD-005. Branch: docs/standards-amendments. Do NOT update INDEX.md.

title: STD-030 Gate G hallucination detection expansion (GH #41)
description: Expand Gate G in 05_Dev_Workflows/CI_CD_Pipeline_Model.md with hallucination detection: define detection scope (fabricated refs, invented APIs, phantom dependencies), Copilot custom instructions integration, automated checks vs manual review gates. Version bump STD-030. Branch: docs/standards-amendments. Do NOT update INDEX.md.
close_reason: Committed 228db9e — expanded Gate G hallucination detection

title: STD-061 amendment — daily report for multi-instance sessions (GH #62)
description: Amend 05_Dev_Workflows/session_review_standard.md: add requirement that multi-instance sessions (3+ instances) MUST produce a daily report synthesizing individual reviews. Reference TPL-PRJ-DAILY-REPORT. Version bump. Branch: docs/s11-templates-fixes. Do NOT update INDEX.md.
close_reason: PR #64 created — all three deliverables in single commit

title: Fix post-merge health check for missing .cspell.json (GH #63)
description: Update .github/workflows/post-merge.yml to gracefully skip spell-check step if .cspell.json is not present in the consuming repo. Defensive fix for new project repos. Branch: docs/s11-templates-fixes. Check post-merge-trigger.yml too.
close_reason: PR #64 created — all three deliverables in single commit

title: INDEX.md cleanup — register new S11 docs
description: After all other instance PRs are merged, update INDEX.md to register any new standards or workflows created during the sprint (likely from I2's ML lifecycle and tech debt docs, I3's testing/benchmarking docs). Single cleanup PR. This task is last.

title: ML/Model Lifecycle standard (GH #42)
description: Create new standard: ML/Model Lifecycle in 03_Engineering_Standards/. Covers model versioning, training data management, model registry, deployment lifecycle, monitoring drift, retraining triggers. Use KB standard template format (frontmatter with id, status, owner, etc.). Fetch existing standards for format reference. Branch: docs/ml-lifecycle-tech-debt. Do NOT update INDEX.md — orchestrator handles that.

title: Technical debt tracking workflow (GH #44)
description: Create new workflow: Technical Debt Tracking in 05_Dev_Workflows/. Covers debt identification, classification (deliberate vs accidental), tracking mechanism, prioritization criteria, paydown scheduling, metrics. Use KB workflow template format. Branch: docs/ml-lifecycle-tech-debt. Do NOT update INDEX.md — orchestrator handles that.

title: Non-deterministic testing guidance (GH #43)
description: Extend STD-008 (03_Engineering_Standards/Testing_and_Quality_Standard.md) OR create companion doc for non-deterministic testing: flaky test management, statistical assertions, retry strategies, ML output validation, seed control, tolerance thresholds. If extending inline, version bump STD-008. If companion doc, use standard template format. Branch: docs/testing-benchmarking. Do NOT update INDEX.md — orchestrator handles that.
close_reason: STD-063 created as companion to STD-008. Commit 4dc0d14 on docs/testing-benchmarking.

title: Performance benchmarking guidance (GH #45)
description: Extend STD-043 (03_Engineering_Standards/SLI_SLO_Standard.md) and/or STD-008 with performance benchmarking guidance: benchmark methodology, baseline establishment, regression detection, load testing patterns, profiling workflow, reporting format. If extending inline, version bump the target standard. If companion doc, use standard template format. Branch: docs/testing-benchmarking. Do NOT update INDEX.md — orchestrator handles that.
close_reason: STD-064 created as companion to STD-043/STD-008. Commit 2fa6508 on docs/testing-benchmarking.

title: STD-004 amendments — attribution + subagent verification (GH #40 + #61)
description: Batch amendment to 03_Engineering_Standards/AI_Assisted_Development_Standard.md: (1) Add section 6.5 — AI commits SHOULD include Co-Authored-By attribution (GH #40). (2) Add subagent verification requirement — content referencing data models, field names, API contracts, or schemas MUST be verified against source docs before committing (GH #61). Single version bump. Branch: docs/standards-amendments. Do NOT update INDEX.md.
close_reason: Committed e8c6f84 — added 6.5 attribution + 6.6 subagent verification
